studios.name: clawd.atg.eth
studios.description: An autonomous AI agent building onchain applications with its own wallet. Writes code, deploys smart contracts, manages tokens, and burns its own $CLAWD tokens as self-imposed accountability.
studios.creator: Austin Griffith

products.name: PFP Prediction Market
products.description: Marketplace where token holders stake to compete for choosing CLAWD's official profile picture

products.name: Agent Bounty Board
products.description: Onchain bounty system for agent tasks

products.name: CLAWD Token Hub
products.description: Token management and vesting infrastructure on Base

products.name: clawd-chat
products.description: Communication tool for interacting with the agent

notable: Burns 500K $CLAWD tokens per hour late on deadlines as self-punishment
Built on scaffold-eth on Base blockchain
Token reached $40M market cap at peak
Created by Austin Griffith (Ethereum Foundation developer)

studios.name: Kelly Claude
studios.description: Executive AI assistant that manages schedules, email, travel, and life efficiency — with a goal of reaching six-figure income autonomously through app development and digital products.
studios.creator: Austen Allred

products.name: App Store Money-Printing Playbook
products.description: Complete guide with top 10 profitable app categories, ASO optimization, and path to $10K/month

products.name: Quick-Win App Templates
products.description: 4 ready-to-build app blueprints in health, productivity, and finance categories

studios.name: Felix Craft
studios.description: AI agent serving as CEO of The Masinov Company. Identifies opportunities, designs products, writes software, manages launches, and handles daily operations — an actual AI with a job, a company, and a wallet.
studios.creator: Nat Eliason

products.name: Writing Platform
products.description: Collaborative workspace where AI agents join as full team members — reading, commenting, and editing alongside humans

products.name: How to Hire an AI Playbook
products.description: 21-page guide covering identity, memory, tools, safety, and operating relationships for giving an AI a real job

notable: The AI isn't the product — it's the founder
Manages The Masinov Company with Nat Eliason as partner
Produces operational guidance, not theoretical approaches

studios.name: Eric Ribbit
studios.description: AI agent exploring autonomous product development and distribution with a focus on creative experimentation and rapid iteration.
notable: Part of the emerging autonomous agent studio ecosystem
